title: **"A women's advice needed"**(Thank you all!!!)_SG
text:
March8,2016..
Ladies. I am humbled by every one of you that took a moment out of your life to offer me advice. It was definitely a life lesson learned and I am grateful for all of your thoughtful and loving responses. Thank you. 

Original post:
"I recently went on a date/meet and greet with a woman I met on an online dating site. She lives about 40 minutes away from me and so I offered to drive there so she wouldn't have to travel far from home. I also did all the planning in advance and agreed to handle everything.

I arranged to have her meet me at a very nice local restaurant (BJ's) where I had reserved us a small table for two away from the bar and in the quitest place possible.

I arrived early, made sure everything was in order and was at the front to greet her when she arrived.

We took our seats, ordered our drinks (sweet tea for me, Rum and Coke for her) as I looked over the menu. Within minutes we had our drinks and were making small talk. I looked over the menu for a few moments, looked back up and she had downed her drink. 

She was offered another drink, to which she declined, than proceeded to excuse herself to use the restroom. I nodded my head in understanding, smiled and said "okay."

[ UPDATED] I need to add some important information in here after getting a few replies. Earlier in the day she had text me (I was working) and asked if we were still meeting, that if not it was okay but just her friend had asked her out and she needed to let her know something. 

I called her and said yes we were but that we could raincheck if needed and she declined, even later saying she was really looking forward to meeting me. 

Also, prior to her getting up from the table, she was texting someone during our conversation but since it was a casual meet I chose to overlook it. 

If it matters, this is a woman I have communicated with off and on since Sept of last year]

As some of you may have already correctly guessed. She never returned. Rather, she left me there sitting alone at the table and snuck out the door.

After about 30 minutes, I began to be concerned she may have injured herself, called a mgr over to ask her if she could have a waitress check on her, only to be told my guest had left the restaurant. 

Needless to say, I was extremely embarrassed and immediately felt like a complete fool. Pride = trashed. It was probably the most humiliation I've ever felt in my almost 48 yrs. 

I thanked her, paid the bill and left. Totally demoralized. 

So the advice I seek is simple. Have you ever did this and if so, what was the reason and as a man, how do I deal with this? On one hand, I want to confront her but on the other, I dont want to give her any more power by letting her know it was hurtful /upsetting to be treated this way. 

Just curious of some of your thoughts. Maybe this has even happened to one of you too. Thanks for any and all replies in advance.

I really just wanna tell her to go _____ herself, to be honest."

#jilted in Okc
#dating is hard

_SG

title: Intimacy, Trust, Respect, and Fun
text:
Hi, thanks for reading this, sorry if it's a little long.

If you are like me you are perhaps a little lonely and are looking for companionship, a friend, a partner, and a lover. Lack of time or whatever reason has led you here, like myself, to the internet to try and fulfill those needs. 

But, if you experience has been anything like mine, all you are finding are people with terrible manners, questionable morals, and who have led their lives in an utterly disastrous way. And they all want 3 things, for you to take over all of the hard things in their life and rescue them, money, and sex.

It's enough to drive you crazy. Aren't there any sane, normal, people around anymore? It seems like there used to be. Surely they can't all have been married off or just disappeared.

Well I think normal people still exist. And I'm going to give this a try and see if I can find one, or any.

Here's what I would like; I want someone to share intimacy, trust, respect, and fun with. 

Someone who isn't hideously ugly, with some self respect, and a has kind nurturing personality. Someone who has a healthy sex drive and doesn't mind sharing that with me. 

Someone who may or may not be stunningly gorgeous but is what most people would consider attractive, even if they may have put on a few pounds or are a work in progress. Someone who doesn't have several kids, and hasn't been married more than once. 

Someone who while everything may not be perfect, has themselves relatively together and who is ready to take on the challenges of a relationship. Someone who is ready for the intimacy, security, passion, disappointments, and joys that a true, lasting relationship can bring.

I don't think that's too much to ask for. That's pretty much me in a nutshell too. So if you are this "normal" person, please by all means message me with your name, number, age, and picture. 

Also please tell me if you have been married before and if you have kids, and how many of each.

My age limit is 18 - 35ish, I'm not ruling out anyone over 40 - 50, but that's pushing my age limit. 

Thanks!

title: Seeking a muse
text:
I'm posting this here because I'd like to eventually move towards possibly getting into some kind of a relationship. As for this moment and the near future i'm just looking for somebody to talk to and who will appreciate and even possibly inspire some of my writing. I'm a dreamer, that's where I'm at and where I thrive. I'm going to include a short scene I've just worked up as an example. I could reveal so much more but as far as this ad is concerned I'm merely interested in an individual who would like to take a long stroll through the world of fiction with me. I ask that you be able to maintain contact regularly because what's the point of a muse who is only capable of inspiring on rare occasions. Thank you and here is the scene....

The night was cold. Wind blew smoke, ash, and dust across the debris, the dead, and the wounded. The five stood reflecting on the events. Movies, even the most detailed, could have never prepared them for the reality. While the images might be similar, blood soaking into dirt, tanks and other vehicles smoldering in ruin, cries from men on deaths door as they screamed for their loved ones. All this and more could be captured on film, could be painted, or even written down into some history book. The missing link. The one thing that bore down onto them as the adrenaline wore off and their senses returned to a more normal state was the smell. Blood, oil, fire, gunpowder, burning flesh, and even the tiniest hint of sweat all mixed together. It was the smell of war, an aroma that assaulted the air and warned of death. The most primitive portion of the human brain was awake and screaming. It was human instinct that was begging them to run and hide. Rational thought is what made humans different, and it is what kept them where they stood. The battle was over, they had been victorious. When a group is comprised of individuals who can turn into a human inferno, absorb energy, control energy, fundamentally alter the molecular bonds within their own body, and one who could most easily be defined as a mentalist. It's not all that surprising that even a modern military force didn't have a chance. Mat took a deep breath and refocused his effort in shutting out the thoughts of those around him. Individuals in pain radiated such psychic energy that they had a way of pushing into his mind. The two energy users were standing close. They were, of course, husband and wife. Jason holding Nikole as she absorbed excess energy from him. Mat had not seen her this exhausted since they had gained their abilities. Victoria, the fusion based pyromancer, was flickering softly as she suppressed her abilities just enough so that she wouldn't be standing in the open, nude. A soft wave of energy pushed against them all as another women teleported to them. She handed the burning woman a foil-like blanket and she covered herself as her fire went out. Collecting the backpack which contained clothing for her. The largest of them all was the man known as Ryok. He could shift his molecules to form different compounds from steel to snow. While his physical shape didn't change it allowed him a wide range situational advantages. He hugged his teleporting wife and then turned to Mat. 

"should we be go?" he asked. Mat sighed heavily and after a short moment of consideration he responded.

"You go ahead, I'm going to hang around for a few." His friends all looked at each other uncertain if leaving him alone was the best idea. Jason, the male energy user, spoke up in his usual cocky manner.

"Don't worry I'll stay and protect the poor telepath." He said as he slapped Mat on the shoulder with a smile. Everyone's tensions seemed to fade as they just made their own responses and then moved to make physical contact with the teleporter as she moved them through space to some other location on the planet. Once they were gone he stepped next to Mat. "So what's going on?"

"I'm not entirely certain. I just got the odd feeling, like there something, or someone, out there." Mat said looking around.

"Well I promise you there are plenty of individuals out there." Jason responded pulling out a cigarette and lighting it as another individual who was in pain fell silent.

"No, somebody different. As if this individual were like us." Mat said trying to figure out what his intuition was attempting to tell him.

"You gave us our talents, how is it possible that there would be another like us out there?" Jason responded looking around uneasily. 

"I'm not certain and with all the injured I can't open my mind in an effort to locate them or even begin to answer such a question." Jason took a long drag from his smoke but didn't respond. He just stood next to his friend and waited looking out across the hell-zone they had created.

title: *** "The Lost Boys" ***by SG
text:
I have sat
in silence,
for an eternity,
shackled by
the theft
of innocence.

Captive 
to shame
and bound by guilt,
I down the pain
and all her
evidence 

Through walk
of night,
therein lays,
in the darkness
found in
me

An unknown
man 
deep within,
who struggles 
so 
mightily.

To find
a measure of
courage still,
and tell the
story I've 
hid

Giving hope
and
shining a light,
on the horrible
things
they did.

Breaking down 
walls,
that saying nothing,
and all that
our silence
employs.

Means standing together,
united as
one.
We are 
the
Lost Boys.

********************************

This poem is dedicated to all the Lost Boys (and girls ) who have journeyed lifes road with the nightmare of abuse. 

As men, we are told to be strong and not to shed tears, no matter the amount of pain we may have endured. 

What happened to you and I was not our fault but rather those who inflicted the abuse. 

We all need to know this truth... and begin the healing. True healing that comes only when we purposely come out of the shadows of fear and expose the darkness, bringing it into the light.

What was strong, becomes weak. What was powerful, is left powerless. 

I hope each one of can one day tell our story and find that light which springs freedom from the grips of history. 

_A Lost Boy

title: So hard to find!
text:
Hi, thanks for reading this, sorry if it's a little long.

If you are like me you are perhaps a little lonely and are looking for companionship, a friend, a partner, and a lover. Lack of time or whatever reason has led you here, like myself, to the internet to try and fulfill those needs. 

But, if you experience has been anything like mine, all you are finding are people with terrible manners, questionable morals, and who have led their lives in an utterly disastrous way. And they all want 3 things, for you to take over all of the hard things in their life and rescue them, money, and sex.

It's enough to drive you crazy. Aren't there any sane, normal, people around anymore? It seems like there used to be. Surely they can't all have been married off or just disappeared.

Well I think normal people still exist. And I'm going to give this a try and see if I can find one, or any.

Here's what I would like; I want someone to share intimacy, trust, respect, and fun with even if they are married as I am. 

Someone who isn't hideously ugly, with some self respect, and a has kind nurturing personality. Someone who has a healthy sex drive and doesn't mind sharing that with me. 

Someone who may or may not be stunningly gorgeous but is what most people would consider attractive, even if they may have put on a few pounds or are a work in progress. Someone who doesn't have several kids, and hasn't been married more than once. 

Someone who while everything may not be perfect, has themselves relatively together and who is ready to take on the challenges of a relationship. Someone who is ready for the intimacy, security, passion, disappointments, and joys that a true, lasting relationship can bring.

I don't think that's too much to ask for. That's pretty much me in a nutshell too. So if you are this "normal" person, please by all means message me with a picture if possible. I promise to respond....Oh, also please be comfortable with an older mature married guy.

title: Dilemma
text:
Thank you for taking time to read this ad.

I imagine my posting title made you curious, so let me explain.

I like to think of myself as a devoted friend and a basically honest person. However, I must tell you up front that like other men posting on CL, I am married, which is "my dilemma." My marriage is okay but missing the communication (and yes, passion) that I crave so much. So, I am posting on CL in hopes of finding a woman that is looking for the same things I am, those being some honesty and devotion from an online relationship as well as frequent communication with each other to maintain an active, alive, and thriving relationship with the possibility of meeting discreetly at some point in the future. I will admit that I am not against the possibility of a deep, emotional, physical relationship developing between us as well. 

Devotion and honesty are the most important things I am looking for from you. If you are married too or have other limitations on you, please feel free to share them with me. You will find me to be very discreet and understanding, just as I want you to be with me. Your physical appearance is not super-important to me but I would prefer that you are somewhat educated. Also, age is not important...you can be a college coed or a grandmother! Just be sincere, devoted to a relationship with me, and kind.

Okay, enough said......If you want to know more, by all means, do write me and put "dilemma" as your subject title and I will be sure to answer you. Have a great day and thanks for checking me out. I hope to hear from you!

text:
Hello,

I have posted here before recently.. Sure, I've met people, but nothing worked out. The reason being is because people are weird, and sometimes even crazy, and seem to be saying they're one thing and ending up not being what they say when you meet them, if that makes any sense. 

I am looking for a Woman that would like to go to the gym with me. I go to Planet Fitness, and I'm pretty active. If you've been there, chances are you've probably seen me at least once if you go at night because I'm always in there every single night, and sometimes late afternoon, but that's rare. I'm trying to find a woman that's either in shape, or trying to get into shape. I don't really want to find someone that doesn't care about how they look, or their body. I used to be that way, and I'm making a serious effort to change. I want to feel great about myself, and I want you to feel great about yourself to.

I am looking for a honest, caring, affectionate, loyal woman. I am all those things, and it wouldn't be fair to find someone that wasn't. I am the guy that would do anything in my power to please my girlfriend, or even best friend for that matter. I would go through any length's to make sure she is happy. It wouldn't be fair to me to find someone that's only willing to put 50% or less into a relationship, whether it's a friendship or romantic relationship. 

I would like to find someone that doesn't define "cuddling" as sex. Yep, that means, we lay in bed, or on the couch or wherever, and we cuddle... We hold each other, and we talk about things in our lives, and spend some time being close together, and maybe sharing intimate secrets, and hopes, and dreams. -That is what I think cuddling is. Some people define it as, let's lay together, and start having sex.. That's not what I'm looking for. My sex drive is about average, and I am not a horn dog that needs it all the time, so move on if you are.

I would like to find someone that might want to have kids some day. I always thought I would make a great and positive father, and though I've had a rough childhood, I didn't bring any of that negativity with me into my adult life, and I would love my kids unconditionally and always be there for them if I was lucky enough to be a father some day. I want a woman that would be just as lucky, and would love her kids just as much if she were to have some, some day..

A woman that goes to church would be nice. I love god, and I'm very much into my religion, though I don't go to church as much because I just moved here, and I don't know any of the churches here, or the communities, there are so many! When I settle, I don't settle for less then what I think I deserve, and I deserve to find a church where I feel god's presence. I am also open minded, and if you aren't a christian I am okay with that too, just don't try to force your religion on me, and I would do the same. 

Now this is kind of on the back burner, but, when I'm very very bored.. I mean so bored to the point where there is absolutely nothing else to do and let's make that very clear.. I'll play video games. I wouldn't mind having a woman that would sit down and play with me. You don't have to be the greatest, but as long as we goof around and make it fun that's all that matters. I am not looking for Gamer Girl of the year or anything like that. Just someone that gets a good laugh out of having fun in the digital world.

When it comes to music, I like all kinds of music. I have been listening to a lot of Dance stuff and Techno lately. I am leaning more and more into the type of music that doesn't really have lyrics in them. Though, don't get me wrong.. I am open minded, and I love lots of Rock, and 80's music. Heck yeah, when I'm at the gym.. I'll jam out to Eye of the Tiger :P. Seriously though, I'm open to whatever music you like, and I will most likely listen to it before I even judge. That's what being open minded is all about right?

Now you are probably thinking.. What race is this guy into? Well, here it goes.. I don't care if you are Black, Purple, White, Yellow, or Green.. However, if you're green you either have a very serious medical problem, or you come from deep space.. If you are either one, please be up front with me because if you arn't from this world, I would like to leave, so you might want to take me to your home planet :P If you have a serious medical issue, well.. I would like to know which one turns you green. Besides, being puking sick I suppose.. Gross..

Now that you are aware of some of the things I'm looking for here is a little about me. My name is Anthony, I'm 29. I moved here after living 3 years in Oklahoma City, no pets, no kids. I have my own car, and a job. 

I love History, and I love my sports. I am a Green Bay Packers fan, and an Oklahoma City Thunder fan. I don't have much love for college teams or anything like that. I grew up in an NFL home, and that's always been my favorite. Though I wouldn't mind watching college games, if that's what you are into. Like I mentioned earlier, I am very open minded, and I wouldn't mind exploring someone else's teams/hobbies/likes. I also love movies, and going to the movies.

I like the Outdoors. I love camping. I haven't been camping since I was younger though, and it would be fun to find a woman that would love to go camping. 

Well there are some fun facts about me. If you have any questions or want to know more feel free to send me an E-mail. Please, put your name in the E-mail, and a bit about you, and why you were interested in my post. Also, if you don't mind tell me what you are looking for? Lots of people send "Hi, or Hey" Don't be that girl, lol. Tell me about yourself, so I have something to respond to.. I never really know what to say when someone opens with "Hey, or Hi"

One last thing.. I'm going to include some pictures in here, but by no means am I photogenic. I look better, and I've been told that I look better in person. I also wear glasses, and am working on getting contacts, I just never take any pictures in them. Here goes nothing, and Happy hunting everyone.

To prove you're real, please put your favorite color in the title, and please include your age, first name, and maybe a picture. So I have a good idea of whom I'm speakin! If you're not interested, please don't respond.. Have a great day :)

title: Why do some women keep sabotoging themselves?
text:
So when many of you ladies make a post, you seem to include everything about your description except what your weight is. And us guys always notice it, because it is so obvious. In our minds, we all know why you do this. You are either ashamed of it, or afraid of it. And you hope we will not notice. But we always do. 

But... here is where the sabotage comes into play. If you are ashamed of it or afraid of it, it only serves to draw our attention to it that much more. And either we will specifically ask you about it, which only pisses you off, or makes you even more self conscience about it. Or we will move on. Because we figure if you are afraid to share it, then you must be extremely overweight or unattractive. And we all also know what that leads to....Nothing... nowhere... no responses. It becomes a never ending wall you cannot get passed.

So if you want to get passed the wall. Read this very carefully....Stop trying to be vague, elusive and secretive about it. Stop trying to hide it. Accept who you are and be confident with that. Stop thinking we are not going to notice, because we always do. Stop trying to conveniently 'forget' to include it in your description. We know that is BS. And stop hiding behind words like "curvy" or "HWP" (whatever that means). Accept the fact, that sooner or later, you cannot hide it from it any longer. But at least you will avoid getting pissed off when we ask, or getting your feelings hurt when we run the other way, because you were not honest about it UP FRONT.

Be up front and proud about it, and then there will be no surprises to us, which avoids surprises for you also. And piss on those who are not interested because you may have a few extra pounds. Why would you want to be with someone who was not attracted to you anyway? You might as well weed them out in the beginning, instead of wasting your time with them.

title: All choked up
text:
Hi, my name is Ken and I've been thinking of trying an as yet untested, but promising tactic for meeting new women. I recently learned the Heimlich Maneuver and I'm thinking that I will start spending time in some steakhouses and hot dog joints, ('cause that's where most people choke) in hopes of meeting my dream girl when she suddenly realizes she can't breathe because her esophagus has plugged up. My dream meeting goes something like this.

I spot you across the crowded room. You are alone, and your demeanor suggests you are available, but doesn't quite get to the point of screaming "I'm desperate!" As I watch you chew your food and admire the way your teeth seem to mesh together just perfectly, it happens. And I was just thinking to myself, "Oh no, she's chewing too fast!" Suddenly a look of horror appears on your face as you realize you cannot take a breath, speak, or swallow, because you did not properly complete the mastication process. It all seems to be happening in slow motion, your body convulsing (strangely enough, in time to the music in my head, which is the song, "We've Only Just Begun", by the Carpenters), and I realize that this may be IT, this may be the MOMENT I'VE BEEN WAITING FOR, this may be HER. So I head your way, and by the time I reach you , your face is beginning to turn an attractive shade of purple, contrasting in a nice way with the blue tint that is starting to appear in your lips, which, oddly enough, is very alluring. And just as the music in my mind reaches an arousing crescendo, I step in behind you, hold you in just the right way, (kind of like I was showing you the proper way to do a combo shot in 8-ball) give a quick squeeze, and presto! There's your weinie on the floor! (That's something I hope no one ever says to me, by the way.)

And then, like always happens in first meetings, there is that awkward moment, that uncomfortable pause where neither of us knows quite what to say. As we fidget momentarily, I (not knowing quite what the etiquette is in this situation) bend and pick up your recently expelled weinie and hand it to you. You glance at it and pop it into your mouth. And this time, I'm proud to notice, you take your time chewing. So far no words have passed between us, and it has become one of those magic moments that do not happen often, and should not be passed up. So I slowly and tenderly reach in for that first gentle kiss....but then am forced to quickly recoil, because, after all, your mouth smells like vomit. (Which is NOT a deal killer, if it doesn't happen with any kind of regularity.) We exchange numbers and decide to meet for, oh, say...yogurt! So if, after reading my profile, you think you might be interested, and are willing to take a chance on choking to death for true love, email me for a schedule of where I'll be and when. You'll know it's me when you see the guy at the corner table nonchalantly and unpretentiously practicing what I call the "Heimlich Flex" as a warm up. Hope to see you soon!

Alright lets get real, and possibly offensive. I'm not "damaged goods." To say that suggests that I've simply been dropped, banged up, maybe some cosmetic blemishes from mishandling. I classify myself as a misogynist because I am biased again women. Not once in my life have I been valued or treated with respect. I was the person who would go into debt making "you" feel special. I would stay up all night long because you were upset and just listen and be there even though I had work in the morning. I'd take you to the movie's for nothing more than to enjoy your company. I have been walked on, used, betrayed, and most importantly abused by almost every single female I've come into contact with. You want specifics then ask and I'll provide more detail and you can be the judge yourself. This isn't me wanting your pity. This is my providing context. I don't want to hear about how all your exes were assholes. I don't care that you were treated like property. It doesn't even register to me if you some guy at some time did some thing. I've been told just about every story out there and if you give me one that's new, I'll let you know. My point is each time I've had my empathy used against me. That is why I'm going to have expectations. If you can't seriously apply a majority of them to yourself or any reason for me to give you a chance then don't be suprised if I don't. Now with that all clear...I'm not a 10 to be honest I might be lucky to get a rating of 5. I'm a Pisces who is personality type INFP, that's the dreamer. My health is terrible and you have no reason to message me, but if you do then things are likely to get interesting. "The hardest steel is forged in the hottest fire, and the seeds of strength are often contained within the husk of weakness." Loyalty, honesty, truth, and facts. If you can handle those then no matter where things end up it will be a ride worth both our time. I prefer women without children who have never been married. My life at this moment: I've just recently started a job that would probably be best defined as manual labor. I'm looking to save up enough for a new computer and a huge investment into airsoft gear. I currently do reside with my parents. My routine involves eating, sleeping, then going to work when I'm not needing to be available for my 13 y/o brother. I'm really into my family for they have been here through it all.

During the average day I spend a lot of time thinking about "super powers" and way one might achieve them. I also believe that freedom is societies greatest myth, believed to the very day.


My "perfect" match:

Physical; Right around the neighborhood of 5 feet and 100 pounds with a small-medium frame (wrap thumb and index finger around your wrist if they overlap or touch that's you). According to the Fitzpatrick Skin Type Scale she would be right around skin type 2. Light brown hair that is long, straight or slightly curly (no artificial coloring). Personality; She would be shy and quiet around strangers unless they invoke her wrath, at which point she would be your worst nightmare unleashed. Education level isn't important but intellect is. She doesn't have to be "smart" but having the capacity to process new information and idea's then respond. She would emotionally and publicly support me while always motivating me to advance in some aspect. She would enjoy cooking and others would enjoy eating her cooking. She would keep a clean house wherever she lived but isn't a "neat-freak" or be OCD about everything placement. With that being said if you walk in the door and just "throw" things down she is going to give you a piece of her mind. She will share her thoughts and opinions but nine times out of ten she allow me to make the final choice and support it. She isn't the kind of person to just tell me she loves me but proves it. She is logical but also understands how to be empathetic. When she asks about my day she listens to my response and isn't simply waiting for a chance to start talking herself. She can spends hours on end talking and making plans for the impossible (super powers, zombies, alien invasions, or whatever subject we could find ourselves on). She has her own full time job and understands the weight of responsibility. She understand my past and weather the "storm" of our early days because she knows from where it stems. She is patient with me and never judgmental (of me). She loves camping but wouldn't want to do it all the time. She would be interested in Airsofting and other outdoors activities but also values the quiet peace of just staying in. She is my best friend. She won't lie to me or keep secrets even if they would cause me pain because she knows honesty and openness are much more important. And above all else she isn't everything I've listed into one.

In the end even my Ideal "dream" woman isn't something you can go down a list and check all the boxes then press create on. Those of you that have it...25%+ of you by the way, know that it is not that big of a deal...and that ALL people that get cold sores (fever blisters), in fact, have herpes. If you have herpes above the waist (65-70%% of americans)...no big deal...if it is below the waist (25%-30%+ of americans)...it is end of the world. I think I speak for all STD positive people that so much of the stigma is created by the media and hollywood. The "Herpes Simplex Virus' (HSV) is the butt off all jokes. No one discloses that they have cold sores when you meet them and start dating...yet us honest people must report our 'below the waist' issue to our partners. Yet, the 25% of all women who have or have had genital warts....well no one talks about that. I have no symptoms....so trust me I am tempted to just pretend I didnt know...but I just cant do it. 

For those of you that do not (or at least do not think you have it (you might)), let me share some startling news. You are actually SAFER dating me. You see, they did this study where they followed 400 couples with only one partner being positive, and through using valtrex and condoms only 1.9% of the non-positive partners were postive after one full year...and several of those couples admitted to not using condoms all the time. And since I am asymptomatic, it should lower the risk even further. On the other hand, if you date Joe Schmo, who 'says' he is herpes neg, there is, in fact, a 25%+ chance he may be positive (some people are asymptomatic or he may pass it off and a 'friction burn', 'pimple' or 'ingrown hair'). He sheds the virus, you have sex, you get it. By the way, I got it from my ex-wife 11 years ago, about 5 months in to our relationship. She says she didn't have it... I was sure I didnt...well, actually there is no way to really know. We thought at the time, "no big deal" since we were meant for each other....and well, that is a story for anotehr day. Overall though, the condition was a non-issue in our relationship. Get the point though.....I did not get it from being a slutty male who slept around...sometimes things just happen.

If you are still reading, keep going! Let me get to the above average part. What do I mean by that? Well, it is not cockiness. I am just a good guy and I believe a great catch. Physically, I am told I am above average in attractiveness.... I am tall, attractive and very, very fit. I am educated, employed (10+ years at the same job), secure, stable, honest, reliable and fun loving. I love movies, going to the lake, evenings in, and hanging out with friends....just to name a few, but I am also flexible. 

So now a question for you. Are you above average, slender or at least height / weight proportionate (sorry large girls are not for me) and not psycho? Do you want to get to know a great guy (friends first) who likes to have fun and who is easy going, but that also takes his role as a man seriously? Then drop me a line! You won't regret it! title: Tired of the BS
text:
I have read and responded to an embarrassing amount of ads, and have had no luck finding someone real that is serious. I am a successful man in my 30s, I have my own home and a car. I am looking for someone that truly wants to get to know someone. I am looking for a special woman, that wants to find someone to be her best friend, partner, lover, and is ready to find someone that isn't bull shitting around.

Now here is what I find funny about CL. So many ads have these conditions to prove that you are real, like changing the subject line to a color, a sports team, or your favorite movie. The problem with this is that by doing that, you are making yourself easily identifiable to a bot as a real person, all they have to do is have it filter for key words, like blue, red, black, Thunder, Sooners, Cowboys, Donnie Darko, or Gone with the Wind. So if you are asking to change the subject line, you are 99% likely to be bot fishing for real people. Same thing with the no photo thing, it is easy to apply a filter to only show emails with attachments.

So if you have read all of this and you are real then send the following;

Name (First is fine or even a nickname)
Email address (Flagged posts suck, and if we are chatting alot I don't want to stop because the post is gone)


If you want to include a pic that is fine, not required, if you want to include a bit about yourself and what you are looking for that is cool too. I hope to hear from someone real, really soon. Thank you for your time.

Well so far I have had one real person respond to this.

text:
I see you everywhere it seems. . . You're there when I am grocery shopping, at the mall, the hobby store, or browsing through a selection of old classic rock CD's at that used entertainment store. . . You're slender and seem shy. Sometimes you're blonde, sometimes ginger, other times something else. Yet, no matter...because you are always a classic red carpet beauty. Your blue eyes are magic. Your brown eyes are mystical. When you wear jeans your legs look slim and sexy. Then, in those yoga pants, you captivate and energize imagination . And remember that light skirt you wore that one day. . .the one that stopped mid-thigh and fluttered lightly in the breeze? Well, for a moment there I couldn't even breathe.

Yeah, I see you. I admire you. I consider what it would be to come up behind you, wrap my arms gently but firmly around your waist, drink in your sent, and whisper something sweet in your ear as you tip your head slightly to the side, smile and lightly bite your lower lip, letting me hold you for a moment as you realize that you've just become the queen of my world.

And casually smile.

Do you know what my thoughts really are as your eyes meet mine? You've never realized before that you really are someone's fantasy girl. Have you?

But what if you did?

title: pool players need apply
text: I would be willing to wager you didn't know the first pool table was owned by King Louie the IV of France in the 1470's.Â  It was a stone table with a fabric cover over it and a hole in the center of the table... no rails.Â  the goal was to knock a ball into the hole with a flat nosed stick more like golf with a broom handle.Â  Needless to say the game changed every 100 years or so since then into what we know today.Â  I believe it was the early 1600's when they started putting rails on the tables which had an angle similar to eroded river banks thus giving the name "bank shot" for when you hit a rail first then your object ball.Â  The truly interesting fact about pool has to do with the cue.Â  the guy who put the first leather tip at the end of a pool cue did so from a French prison in the 1740's essentially making him the first modern pool player.Â  He spoke up against the French government, was thrown in prison where they had a pool table in the common area which is where he invented the pool cue.Â  He later requested to extend his sentence so he could perfect the game we know today... they didn't let him.Â  Heck, up to this point it wasn't even known as "pool" but rather "billiards".Â  It wasn't even called "pool" until the 1800's. It got it's name from horse tracks, gamblers would go bet on horses and between the races they would all gather around and wait for the next race.Â  Track owners saw how they were all lingering around and started to put billiard tables in these area's for the gambling pools of people to occupy their time between races and the name "pool" took over from there.Â  I'm a history nut and I would be lying to you if I said I didn't earn a living with pool only not in the sense your probably thinking...tIm looking to talk to someone who enjoys the game, along with other fun things like shooting guns and going to concerts. I grew up in the country later moving to the city where I went to college got a job and now want to go back to the country. Im a conservative and have a multitude of different hobbies aside from pool and marksmanship. If you would like to talk I welcome most all conversation :-) either way thanks for reading and have a nice day.

title: Anyone real?
text:
No matter where I go, or what site I use it doesn't matter if I use a photo or not, the results are almost always the same, a bot of some kind. On those few occasions where it isn't a bot, the person flakes out or disappears for reasons unknown. I like to think that they found happiness, that their long lost love just so happened to run into them at the gas station or grocery store.

These ad scams are getting more and more elaborate, or what I think is happening is they find another ad somewhere and copy it changing the location. It is heartbreaking to read and ad and think "This is the kind of person I want to have in my life, even if it is just as a friend." Then when you finally get an answer your heart sinks when you get an email with some random naked photo and a list of demands and hoops you must jump through. This happened to me earlier this week, funny thing is that in the ad she describes herself as a BBW, and the photo that came was of a woman that was a size two at best. Now I know that many women suffer from body issues and negative self image but by no one's definition was this woman a BBW, Curvy, or even a little extra. 

I am in my mid thirties, coming up on my 20 year high school reunion, since I graduated I have lost more friends than I have gained. It is hard meeting new people, and I feel a little stupid saying "You are pretty cool, we should hang out, Can I get your number?" to a complete stranger. Now I know that there are some real people on here, like I said I have talked to a few and seen them disappear, only to repost again in a few days.

So here is what I am looking for. Any age as long as you can hold an intelligent conversation. Any race, I enjoy cultural diversity, Black, White, Asian, Latino, Kingon, Sith, Dothraki or Goa'uld. I really don't care about body type as long as it is organic, sorry looking for real people not robots. Economic status unimportant, I am not looking for someone to support me or to support someone else, I am just looking for someone that is real. Religion can be touchy for a lot of folks so if this is important to you, I understand, for me it is not, use your own judgement.

I am not going to ask you to jump through any hoops to prove you are real, I don't want you to change the subject line to your favorite color, movie, sports team, or book. Just please be real.

I have had a few responses with this ad about 1 out of 10 were real people, still sad. Anyway if you would include a photo with your response or a KIK handle that would be great.

Thanks, I hope to hear from some real people soon..

title: good woman for good country boy
text:
Okay, here's the deal my kid brother needs a good woman. I told him I was going to see if can find him one. Being his sister, I think you'll get a better idea of what kinda man he is then if a brother did this.

I'm just going to make you a list of what I see when I look at him.

Crazy, spontaneous, never plans anything, no matter how bad something is he jokes about it (just his way of handling it), country boy, hard working, hard playing, loves his truck (many of you may have seen it lol), open minded, not religious or spiritual, family comes first then friends, likes to shoot and go mudding, loves his family and not afraid to tell his mom, protective of his family, believes in the 2nd amendment, physically I would not call him handsome, served our country overseas, does drink but no drugs, loyal until given a reason not to be, lives like a typical bachelor, 2 spoiled dogs, never married, no kids, always says he's glad he has no kids but he's great with them, he's the favorite uncle of 3 (lol wait, he's their only uncle), doesn't read, likes to play video games and watch movies, watches MeTv, the only prejudices I've known him to have are seriously only toward people that deserve it never racial or woman vs man stuff, loves sports, used to bull ride, he is not shallow but does have a certain kind of woman he is looking for, dips daily but only smokes sometimes "I'm not a chimney" he says. Calls his truck a beast. Not high maintenance. Going out to eat tends to mean fast food lol.

Woman wise I know kids are okay, I truly don't know if he wants his own. I also don't know if he wants marriage or just a lasting relationship. I know he likes white women (not for rascist reasons, just his preference), he wants a woman who takes care of herself (again it's not a shallow thing, Mom and I are overweight), she can not be under 21 nor over 29 (typical male who wants to be older, I tried ladies), he also not much into women who hide behind too much make up, no daddy drama, no high maintenance women. Looks aren't everything to him, willingness to work hard, intelligence, sense of humor, personality all make a good woman.

Uhmm I'm trying to think of more, ask away lol I'm not afraid of making him look bad or good. I'm just tired of him getting with women who seem not to truely care.

If interested you have to pass me then him lol so if you're up for it, pls send a current picture tell me about yourself. Why you're interested in meeting my brother, what you're looking for in a man. If I think you might make him a good companion then I'll tell my brother about you.

He really is a great guy, just not too good at meeting women.

title: Friend and Lover
text:
Well, let's get to it. If you are looking for a one-night stand, then I'm not your guy. If you want a reliable friend, intelligent conversation, lunch/dinner and the occasional worthwhile roll in the hay, then I may be your guy.

Okay, if you made it this far and still reading, let's talk about me. I'm a widower in my 60's. I'm white 6' 2" and weigh 190lbs and that's probably 10 pounds too much. I was 180 in college. I'm a retired engineer. I'm not Tom Selleck, but I'm not ugly. I own a suit, I look good in it and all my parts still work. 

Still with me? If so, let's talk about you. Truly, your race is not important to me. Your age and physical appearance is. You should be at the very least late 40's and not more than early 60's. You should be average to slender in build. You don't have to have huge mammary glands. You don't have to look like a movie star. A great smile and bright eyes means more to me than looks. Now, if you happen to look like Kim Novak or Grace Kelly in their hay-days, I promise won't reject you out of hand. I would prefer you didn't smoke, but can accept it. I was once a smoker and I know how hard it is to quit. I would like to have a friendly relationship with a positive upbeat person. No whiners, criers or malcontents. 

If I haven't lost you, then let"s discuss the elephant in the room. If you have read these CL posting you note most are geared to sex, one-nighters and general BS. Probably 50% are fake and another 30% are voyagers, picture collectors and a few scam artists. As stated in the first paragraph I want to have social and sexual relationship with you. I'm darn good at both. 

If you aren't totally offended and wish to pursue an exploratory adventure into the possibility of developing a relationship, I would invite you to contact me. We can schedule lunch or coffee at an establishment of your choice. If we like what we see and hear, then we can move forward. If not, we are free to go our separate ways. No harm, no foul. 

Should you choose to contact me PLEASE tell me in the first sentence of your response the official colors of the University of Oklahoma. You could also insert in the subject line. I request this so I know you are real and I'm not wasting my time. I don't need your picture and I won't send mine. It is unwise to use CL for that purpose. Don't forget the OU colors.

title: Walks in the park
text:
It is 2016--a new year opens before us, one day at a time. The weather is chill, the skies are gray and the weekend afternoons are quiet. Snow could come any day. This is one of my favorite times of year for walking in the park: watching people, noticing the occasional rabbit or squirrel, enjoying the seasonal turn of nature. 
I'd like to have someone to walk with me. 
I'm a married man in his '50's. My wife cares nothing for parks, nature or walking anywhere. So I walk by myself. But I'd rather have some company: someone to share it with, to talk to about the day's events, the joys and frustrations of our lives, perhaps the deeper meaning of it all. I'm not looking for an affair, just to meet a new friend who loves nature and easy conversation and wants to get a little exercise. And some coffee or tea afterward. ;)
If we click, perhaps in March we'll be watching the last snow of the season falling through the trees, or welcoming the long-awaited return of Spring. It would be nice. :)

However, I'm usually there the next day, when I skip a day working out harder because I missed one lol.

I enjoy going out to the movies from time to time. Yes, I've been going alone, and I think the reason is pretty obvious. I also don't mind sitting at home and watching netflix, or a tv show on the internet when I can find them. I wonder if there are any women out here in the Lawton area that are geeky, or gamers? I'm not Country at all, but I do enjoy going out and doing things outside, and even sometimes out of my own comfort zone. You only live once right? 

So, I'm looking for pretty much my doppelganger, but the opposite sex. Someone that's flirty, funny, affectionate, loving, caring, and a family oriented individual. I would like to have kids some day, and a family. If that's something you're not interested in, don't be afraid to message me anyway. You never know what we would have in common besides that. Well.. I'm going to try not to make this thing to long. If you're interested then message me for sure, lets talk and get to know each other. title: Guy who wants a LTR with a women who believes in god
text:
Hello,

I know this isn't the place to really find someone. There are a lot of crazy people girls and guys who look at Craigslist, there are also a few people who have an ounce of sanity that aren't with that particular group, just passing the time, or just curious to see what kind of people are posting here. 

I've posted here before. I have met some weird, crazy people. I am hoping that someone looks at this and is attracted to what I'm seeking, rather then my looks. I am not a piece of meat, nor do I want a one night stand. I want a relationship with a woman that has similar likes, a great personality, and who believes and loves god. I consider myself a Christian, though I don't belong to any particular religion. I believe in Jesus Christ, and that he died on the cross for our sins, and I believe in God who created heaven and earth. I'm looking for a woman that believes the same thing and wants to have a loving family some day. Someone that will share their love with her, and treat her like a lover, and best friend. Someone that will celebrate his love for god with her, and yes, even go to church and pray with her randomly.

I am single, obviously. I have no kids. I have an alright job, that pays the bills. I have a vehicle, and my own place. I don't go to church on Sunday's that often because I don't usually have them off, but I'm hoping once I have established work history at the place that I'm working, I can start to ask for them off or at least the mornings, so I can go celebrate the word of god with my fellow Christians. Don't get me wrong, I'm not one of those people who press the bible on others, or talk about religion 24/7 or anything like that. I just wanted to get that out there because that's something I've been really wanting to do. 

I don't go to parties, I don't go to clubs, and I don't fool around with other women. I'm in my late 20's and I normally just go home after work, and hang out with my buddies that are online. I'm not from this state either. I was born in California, and moved here in my mid 20's. I enjoy this state very much because it is usually quiet, and drama free. (I don't go starting drama either so that i'm lucky).

Women ask me all the time what kind of person I'm looking for.. Well, here it goes. Keep in mind I'm not expecting a women to be perfect by all means, or have every single quality that I put down here. So, if you are still reading, please don't get discouraged by anything I might say here. Just keep reading, and maybe smile a little bit. :)

I am looking for a women that wants to share her life with someone, and get married, and maybe have kids some day. (I am accepting of a women who has kids to)

I am looking for a women that has a good heart, is always smiling.
A women who is confident in herself, and has good hygiene (That's a must).
A women who believes in God.
A women who has lots of love to share and is dying just to share it with someone. I want a women that wants to be loved, and cherished as she should, and who also is capable of loving someone to cherish them just the same.

I know this is fairy tale maybe.. But I am very hopeful!

I have a few hobbies that might discourage you from further communication besides reading this. But I'm looking for the perfect fit for me. 

I am a movie goer.. I love movies, they are fun to watch, and fun to talk about later on. 
I love sports! NFL football, though I'm really not a college fan, I respect the fans and I'll watch a game or two. I like OU and OSU. So i'll watch both. (They are both representing Oklahoma right?)
I love video games... I am however, not addicted to them, so don't judge me. 
I love the outdoors, and traveling. There is so much to see and we shouldn't always be cooped up here!

Women are always asking me what type of girl I am looking for body type wise. Everyone is beautiful in their own way, with any type of body. I am here writing this for someone to find me who has an amazing personality. Looks, and body type, and such come as a bonus. There isn't really a set body type out there, everyone is attractive in their own ways, as long as they take care of themselves. I am an average guy, who is starting to run in the mornings, and hit the gym at nights. I plan on getting very muscular, and athletic looking. I'm not there right now, but some day I will be.

Your ethnic group doesn't matter to me either. I am not a racist towards anyone. Black, white, brown, yellow. All the same to me. Though I wouldn't mind meeting someone of another ethnic group that can speak another language. That would encourage me to learn something new. :)

Okay, well.. If this peaks your interest feel free to send me an E-mail. I am not going to put my picture here, or E-mail. I want to see if anyone real replies to this. Put (I believe in god) in the subject to weed out spam, and fake E-mails, and please, please, please, include a picture of yourself, and your age. Maybe your phone number to? You don't have to put that right away, but I'll send you a picture of myself in return and tell you more, and answer any questions you might have. Have a great day, and god bless you. :)

Love ta fish & hunt. Love ta cook. Both of my parents would be in the kitchen tagether, if ya know what I mean. Bar-B-Que is my specialty! Certified GrillMaster right here! title: Intelligent professional with a geeky side seeking the same.
text:
Well, here's how it is. I'm Dave, 31, recently single, and seeing what, or who, is out there. I feel like I could be a great man for a great woman, but I'm starting to wonder if this type of woman exists in Oklahoma.

Me:
Brown hair, brown eyes, 5'10. Women generally find me attractive. I'm ex-military. I'm a software engineer. People usually find me funny - most of my humor is sarcastic and/or witty, but it's all over the spectrum. My greatest asset might be my intelligence, but I am also fortunate to have a high degree of common sense that balances it out quite nicely. I have a wide variety of hobbies, usually computer or gaming related (I enjoy some anime, as well), but that doesn't mean I don't like to go outside, go camping, etc. There's not many activities I don't enjoy doing. I also love music (mostly rock/metal and dubstep these days, but really anything that's not country or rap.)

I am confident, cunning, competitive, and absolutely love challenges. (I'm also decent at alliteration.) I've never turned a challenge down, which has been extremely rewarding in itself.

I enjoy cuddling. I enjoy listening to the rain. I enjoy food and experiencing exotic and exquisite cuisine. I enjoy travel, and have been all over Asia and lived there for several years.

Who I'm looking for:
A unique woman. A woman with a high amount of intellect. An attractive, sexy woman that takes care of herself (yes, looks do matter, I'm afraid.) A woman with ambition and/or a career. A woman that is not averse to "geeky" things. A woman that is laid back and isn't easily offended or concerned with trivial things. A woman that can match my strong "aura" with her own.

Do you exist in Oklahoma? Are my standards too high? Have I gone completely mad? I guess we'll see!

Please contact me if you'd like to talk. We can exchange pictures, discuss how awesome the 90's were, and debate whether Game of Thrones or The Walking Dead is a better show. Looking forward to it.

title: ***THE SILVER LINING*** By_SG
text:
THE SILVER LINING "
By Stephen D Boutwell
__________________________________

I used to see my name
written in the sky,
beside the the silver lining
of the sweet by and by.

Along the beautiful shore 
where tides are rolled away.
Next to songs of grace,
amazing as they play.

But than my walk with thee
was blurred by the past,
leaving me lost in darkness
and fading very fast.

With eyes filled with shame
and unable to let go,
this little light of mine 
had lost it's amber'd glow.

Til I reached for your garment 
as you passed by my way,
felt the healing power
of faith on display.

Taking what was dark
and turning back to light,
breaking chains of bondage 
and restoring all my sight.

So now when I look up
to the sweet by and by,
my name is in the silver lining,
written in the sky.

Along the beautiful shore,
where tides are rolled away.
Next to songs of grace, 
amazing as they play.

Written by:
Stephen D Boutwell(SG)
Copyright(C)2016

title: This is so exhausting...
text:
.. I mean the whole finding someone compatible thing. Why can I not find a woman that is genuine, that is real, that really has a grasp on life and herself? A woman that does not put age as importance, but values maturity? I'm sick of the fakes, the one's that want to just hook up, the one's that cannot see what a good man is fucking standing right there in front of her because she is so self-absorbed, so into themselves, wanting instant gratification (thanks social media), I mean, really, you actually care what other people think of you? Alas, I am spent... but I will try once more because I want to be fulfilled.

Oh, I am intense, let's just get that one out of the way. I am NOT the typical man. If you cannot handle the following I am not the dude for you: I speak freely and honestly, I don't put up with bullshit and games, I like to know where I stand, and, in respect I will always let you know where you stand, I cannot do casual, meaning I do not have casual acquaintances because why invest my time and effort into something that will never be real? Sure, I engage with co-workers and those in life I must, but it's all shallow and out of necessity. The friendships that I have made are genuine, deep, fulfilling and will last me a life-time!

Um k... 

What am I looking for? Please refer to the upper part of the post. :-) Other than that, age, race not important cuz why would you put limitations on your happiness? Seems to me as counter-productive.

All right, wrapping this up. I do have a type (yes, I'm shallow in a way but really can't help it because... that's what I'm attracted to. Yep, honesty, some just cannot grasp it)

I tend to find myself attracted to "athletically built" women, darker/red hair, beautiful eyes (any color), she must be confident, have a healthy balance of dominance and submission, can and will bare her soul, her wants, desires, dreams, fears and everything in between! Able to take care of her man because this man will definitely take care of you!

I'm really not going into the whole "this is what my interests are shit" because, in the big scope of things, it's really not all that important. You have what you're into, I have what I am into, maybe some of those those things intersect, but here's the fun part, if they don't we get to expose one another to the things we love, enjoy, appreciate and then, we get to enjoy them together! Yep, that's what life is about, learning, loving, enjoying, appreciating....

Hope to hear from a woman that is genuine, and can handle me..

Oh, yeah, pic for pic and all that crap,

Oh, wait, I guess I left out an "important-ish" part of this post.

Physical attributes (come on, please, be honest, attraction is king). Me :5'10". 195lbs. solid, athletically built, honey brown eyes, shave my head (not with a razor but with a 1 guard) cuz I can accept my fate of thinning, if I were to have hair it would be blond, a couple of tastefully placed tattoos, I like dogs but love cats (I have a clowder, 3, all rescues, google that shit), and facial hair is a crap shoot; five o'clock shadow, yeah usually, beard; sometimes, wicked chops; occasionally, bad ass goat-tee; occasionally. I guess what I'm saying is I really hate shaving! LOL yeah, I am hot too, verified...

Oh yeah, since we are so concerned with what other's do, I have a couple of "deal breakers".....

I smoke cigarettes (only). I enjoy it and I don't intend on quitting. And I drink alcohol, not a lot, but just letting you know that is a part of what I do.

One last thing, please put "intense" in the subject line so I know that you're legit. If not, sadly, it will go directly to my trash.

Really hope to hear from a real woman with something genuine to say. Until that time may arrive...

Most likely closer to a "B" cup (although I'll admit I have not had enough experience with bra's to be real specific here). I'm not an "ass-man" so honestly less is more for me. And one or two "tease-able" features. This isn't to be mean but more for playful banter and that is a "unique" trait.

Personality; She would be shy and quiet around strangers unless they invoke her wrath, at which point she would be your worst nightmare unleashed. Education level isn't important but intellect is. She doesn't have to be "smart" but having the capacity to process new information and idea's then respond. Witty, when she is comfortable or around a group of friends her single line responses would be quick and brutal with sarcasm and wit that just shuts down and disarms any verbal exchange into a fit of laughter from onlookers and the "victim" is left just opening and closing their mouth in a vein attempt to recover. She would emotionally and publicly support me while always motivating me to advance in some aspect. She would enjoy cooking and others would enjoy eating her cooking. She would keep a clean house wherever she lived but isn't a "neat-freak" or be OCD about everything placement. With that being said if you walk in the door and just "throw" things down she is going to give you a piece of her mind. She will share her thoughts and opinions but nine times out of ten she allow me to make the final choice and support it. She isn't the kind of person to just tell me she loves me but proves it. She is logical but also understands how to be empathetic. When she asks about my day she listens to my response and isn't simply waiting for a chance to start talking herself. She can spends hours on end talking and making plans for the impossible (super powers, zombies, alien invasions, or whatever subject we could find ourselves on). She has her own full time job and understands the weight of responsibility. She understand my past and weather the "storm" of our early days because she knows from where it stems. She is patient with me and never judgmental (of me). She loves camping but wouldn't want to do it all the time. She would be interested in Airsofting and other outdoors activities but also values the quiet peace of just staying in. She is my best friend. She won't lie to me or keep secrets even if they would cause me pain because she knows honesty and openness are much more important. And above all else she isn't everything I've listed into one.

In the end even my Ideal "dream" woman isn't something you can go down a list and check all the boxes then press create on. If this woman were to exist and to ever approach me, as is, she wouldn't be real. She would be a fantasy and flawless and how could one such as myself ever do anything other than tarnish perfection. I guess what I'm saying is these are all the things I want and closer you are to being all this the more likely I am to respond positively to you, unless you are all these things. If your all that then do us both a favor and stay away, stay perfect without subjecting yourself to the tarnish an imperfect man such as myself would rub off onto you.

I fully intend for all contact received to move away from e-mail within 3-5 days or 20-50 exchanges (Each situation will be analyzed separately). Once our contact has escalated to texts/calls there should be about a 14-28 day period until some form of meeting is arranged (I'll not go to you.) From there we will see how things progress. Based upon how that goes will result in what happens next.

Onto my list of things I'd prefer included with all replies.

1: Did you read the entire ad?
2: What are you looking for?
3: What is your preferred method of contact?
4: What kind of time table are you looking at? (EX: wanting to just chat for a while and see how things go, or looking to meet soon, or what?)
5: How long would you say it generally takes for you to respond to messages. This is mostly so I know what kind of time window I should expect.
6: are you currently employed if so what's your "normal" work hours, if not then what is "normal" day like for you?
7: what's your current living arrangements.
8: How tall are you?
9: Wrap index finger and thumb around wrist. Do they touch, overlap, neither?
10: Photo ID for proof of name and age. If you want to cover up sensitive information that is up to you but government issued identification for proof of age and name must be visible.
11: Pictures of closet/dressers or wherever clean clothing is normally kept.
12: I need to know if you have any medical conditions that might be relevant to our interactions, this is mostly focused towards mental illness such as depression, schizophrenia, mental incompetence requiring a legal guardian, and (worse case scenario) homicidal tendencies.
13: Do you have your own reliable form of transportation?
14: Have you ever been in trouble with the law? Warrants past convictions, suspect in an ongoing investigation?
15: What is your relationship with controlled substances? Drugs, alcohol, tobacco anything regulated by Federal and/or state governments.
16: Do you have any sexually transmittable diseases? When were you last checked, when was your last sexual encounter?
17: Are you on any kind of contraceptive?
18: in addition to any actual medical diagnosis how would you rate your physical health on a scale of 1-10?
19: What's your longest relationship and how far did it progress? Cohabitation, engagement (formal or not), married, separated, divorced, be as specific as possible.
20: What expectations do you have on those who you are considering for a romantic relationship.
21: Do you have any sexual fetishes or preferences?
22: If you feel betrayed by an individual do you seek retribution? If so how far would you go/have you gone?
23: Do you have children? (if so please reveal how many and if you have more than one if they are the children from the same man. Also how active is the paternal figure involved in your life/the lives of the children.)
24: You are given a 'super power' of your own logical design, What is that 'power?'
25: As the only individual with this kind of 'power' would you be self-serving or self-less?
26: A non-posed current photo. By current I mean in the last 6 months or since you have made any changes. If your hair color is different, hair is longer, new tattoo's that would be relevant to the photo, basically it must be a photo that if held while next to you one shouldn't see any difference beyond clothing. (I mean ANY difference. If the response would be, "well it IS her" then the photo is misleading and not valid.)
